claremont Colleges News

Nigerian Afrobeats superstar Davidos new album is as Timeless as its title writes columnist Rowan Gray PERIOD

Sometimes I want an album to envelop me like a warm hug but the more I listen to music the more I find myself wishing I could fill a syringe with concentrated noise and inject it straight into my amygdala PERIOD Scaring the Hoes satisfies the latter urge and then some PERIOD

Lil Yachty is moving to the big leagues PERIOD With a new intergenre album the music artist is redefining his reputation argues music columnist Rowan Gray CM  PERIOD

To keep the spookiness going this season music columnist Hannah Weaver SC  recommends 18yearold Elliott Fullams debut album PERIOD

Music columnist Nicholas Black PO  explains how Chlo and the Next twentieth Century is not only a sonically dazzling album but also a turning point for Father John Misty PERIOD

One Twice Melody exemplifies the brilliance of Beach House by blending experimentation and consistency writes music columnist Nicholas Black PO  PERIOD

Red Taylors Version allows Swift to reconceptualize and reclaim her work argues music columnist Ava Hinz SC  PERIOD

Remi Wolfs debut album bursts with colorful visuals and energetic melodies while exploring a range of emotions writes music columnist Ava Hinz SC  PERIOD

Lordes third album Solar Power marks a refreshing beginning of a happier Lorde writes Barbara Norton PO  PERIOD

Music columnist Ava Hinz SC  explains how Kanye Wests unique release of Donda signals a possible shift away from traditional album releases PERIOD
